title: Singapore our homeland, it's here that we belong

replies.msg:
All of us united, one people marching on
We've come so far together, our common destiny
Singapore forever, a nation strong and free
用英文唱歌詞露骨嘅愛國歌曲唔會肉麻咩

用英文唱歌詞露骨嘅愛國歌曲唔會肉麻咩

This is my country, this is my flag.
This is my future, this is my life.
This is my family, they are my friends.
We are Singapore, Singaporeans.

We are one Singapore
One Nation strong and free
A thousand different voices
Sing in harmony
We will stand together
Together hand in hand
As One united people
For Singapore, my homeland

用英文唱歌詞露骨嘅愛國歌曲唔會肉麻咩

人地大把後生真心唱
點睇新加坡政府要搵個加拿大人Hugh Harrison去作呢首愛國歌曲，仲要包辦作曲填詞？

洗咗腦嗰啲乜都唱架啦
只不過歌詞唔係「沒有李光耀就沒有新加坡」之類
